CustomField.defaultValue: "Contains three internal links dispersed evenly throughout the content with keyword-rich anchor text. All external links (if any) open in a new tab. All CTA buttons open to the relevant page."
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Contains three internal links dispersed evenly throughout the content with keyword-rich anchor text. All external links (if any) open in a new tab. All CTA buttons open to the relevant page.
CustomField.label: Internal Linking Feedback
